header.title: VS Code Debugging
header.description: Professional debugging with breakpoints and debug object. Master VS Code debugging for Endorphin AI tests with comprehensive debugging tools.

quickSetup.title: Quick Setup
quickSetup.description: Get debugging up and running in 3 steps

step3.title: 3. Run Your Test in Debug Mode
instructions: 1. Set a breakpoint anywhere in your test file
2. Press F5 or select "Debug Endorphin Test"
3. When execution pauses, open the Debug Console
4. You now have access to the endorphinDebug object!

debugObject.title: The Debug Object
debugObject.description: Comprehensive test information at your fingertips
debugObject.intro: When ENDORPHIN_DEBUG=true, Endorphin AI creates a global debug object with comprehensive test information:

debugUtilities.title: Debug Utilities
debugUtilities.description: Powerful debugging functions for test inspection

functions.getSetupResult: Get test setup result (v0.9 smart tests)
functions.getDataGenerationResult: Get data generation result (v0.9 smart tests)

functions.inspectTools: List all available tools with details
functions.getLastToolResult: Get result of last tool execution

functions.getCurrentPage: Get current page URL and title

example1.title: Example 1: Test Stuck on Loading
example1.problem: Problem: Test seems stuck waiting for page to load
example1.solution: Solution: Page is genuinely stuck, investigate application issue

example2.title: Example 2: Button Click Failing
example2.checkNote: Check what's actually on the page
example2.maybeNote: Maybe we're on wrong page or button text changed

example3.title: Example 3: High Token Usage Investigation
example3.problem: Problem: Test consuming too many tokens
example3.optimization: Optimization: Simplify prompts or break into smaller tests

example4.title: Example 4: v0.9.0 Setup/Data Debugging
example4.problem: Problem: Dynamic test data not working as expected
example4.verification: Verify your setup/data functions returned correct values

conditionalBreakpoints.title: Conditional Breakpoints
conditionalBreakpoints.description: Set breakpoints that only trigger under specific conditions:
conditionalBreakpoints.onlyBreaksNote: Only breaks when token usage exceeds 10,000

logPoints.title: Log Points
logPoints.logsNote: Logs to Debug Console without pausing

watchExpressions.title: Watch Expressions
watchExpressions.valuesNote: Values update automatically as test runs

issue1.title: Issue: Debug Object Not Available
steps: Verify execution is paused at breakpoint

issue2.title: Issue: Breakpoints Not Hitting
steps: Ensure test ID matches in args
